entities.name: occlumency
entities.description: Harry is trying to learn Occlumency from Professor Snape.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, a wizard who has a scar on his forehead.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: One of Harry's friends, a witch who is concerned about Harry's well-being.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: One of Harry's friends, a wizard who is impatient and curious.

entities.name: madam pince
entities.description: The librarian at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

entities.name: you-know-who
entities.description: A dark wizard who is the main antagonist of the story.

entities.name: ministry of magic
entities.description: The governing body of the wizarding world in Britain.

entities.name: department of mysteries
entities.description: A department within the Ministry of Magic where mysterious and powerful objects are kept.

relationships.description: Harry is trying to learn Occlumency from Professor Snape.
Hermione is concerned about Harry's well-being.
Ron is curious about what Harry has realized.
Madam Pince works at the Ministry of Magic.
You-Know-Who is targeting the Ministry of Magic.
Harry believes that the weapon You-Know-Who is after is in the Department of Mysteries.
